title: Popayan, Colombia; Verso: Mountain Landscape, Colombia
medium: Pencil and brown crayon on paper
description: Obverse: oblique view of a side of a street, at left. A part of a house is shown at right. Cloudy sky with inscribed figures. Written at right: "2 Bright smoky laky orange light/ 3 More dusky approaching brown / 4 Warm dusky purple / 5 cool purple / 6 rich low toned / laky red / 7 cool purple light / 8 mixed blurred effect with brilliant touches of yellow light / Popayan from the balcony / of Mr. Gregory's house Aug 9 / 53.
name: Drawing
